attributes.action: stop farting on the Her Majesty the Queens corgis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Video footage captured on several independant occasions of the right honourable Prime Minister Tony Blair actively expelling gaseous discharges upwind of the Royal corgis has led to this petitons creation. Please think of the welfare of these poor dogs and sign this petition

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
